1259480.name: Pteranodon's Flight: The Flying Dinosaur Game
1259480.description: Welcome to Pteranodon's Flight! This high-speed action game allows you to take control of one of history's greatest flying reptiles. Dip, dive, swoop and soar as you hunt for prey, weave through jagged rocks and brave an erupting volcano! Before you dive in, join Wendy Martin as you take a close look at life-like scale models of these ancient creatures. Be careful, though! You might actually learn something!
1259480.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
